h2_title: Yaoguai Queen Boss Fight - Kang-Jin Loong
content: Certain times, her slamming attacks to create lightning strikes can end with her making a quick spin to emit a blast of lightning from her mouth. She'll pivot slowly to spread the breath in front of her, but this can be avoided by gaining height using the Pillar Stance.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Snowhill_Path_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Snowhill Path Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Yaoguai Queen Boss Fight - Kang-Jin Loong'.
The content is as follows:
Certain times, her slamming attacks to create lightning strikes can end with her making a quick spin to emit a blast of lightning from her mouth. She'll pivot slowly to spread the breath in front of her, but this can be avoided by gaining height using the Pillar Stance.
